home_description_one: Hello, I am Juan Gomez. I am passionate about software development and technology. I love constantly learning new technologies with the aim of innovating and perfecting the projects I work on.
home_description_two: I am a full stack developer with experience exploring both Frontend and Backend. I love creating, improving, and fixing things, and I enjoy the process of learning new technologies, even when it involves breaking and rebuilding to better understand their functioning.
about_me_text_one: As a software developer, I find satisfaction in tackling new challenges, breaking them down into manageable tasks to achieve efficient solutions. I am open to opportunities that allow me to acquire new skills and contribute to the team and its outcomes.
about_me_text_two: I have experience in backend development using various programming languages, including PHP with frameworks such as Laravel, Lumen, and Bonfire, as well as JavaScript with Node.js for backend development. I also have experience in frontend development using Angular and React with JavaScript. Additionally, I am familiar with AWS services, which allows me to implement scalable and robust solutions in the cloud.
